dog."},{"lineNumber":86523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デカイし、むさいし、声はでかいし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　They’re big, smelly, and right."},{"lineNumber":86534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　JAPANの防備もあります故、","translatedEnglishLine":"　Considering JAPAN’s continent.\""},{"lineNumber":86539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つっても、今は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, at the means"},{"lineNumber":86542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今のところありませんので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　at this time to cross to the continent...\""},{"lineNumber":86543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、お前の折角の力、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, your precious power"},{"lineNumber":86544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この状況じゃちっとも役に立たんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"　is of no use at all in this I can’t, but what if I could?\""},{"lineNumber":86554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出来ないならいい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you can’t, that’s fine..."},{"lineNumber":86555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　Hah...\""},{"lineNumber":86556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"??\""},{"lineNumber":86557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":86558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　初代妖怪王様にすごいことを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　you’ve done something amazing for the first Youkai King...\""},{"lineNumber":86559,"originalJapaneseLine":"妖怪軍団が揃ったことにより、","translatedEnglishLine":"With the youkai troops gathered,"},{"lineNumber":86560,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋の防備は強固に。","translatedEnglishLine":"the defenses of Tenmabashi became strong."},{"lineNumber":86561,"originalJapaneseLine":"新たな仲間、初代妖怪王黒部を従え、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a new comrade, the first Youkai King Kurobe at their side,"},{"lineNumber":86562,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は更に拠点の守りを強化したのだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others further strengthened their base's defenses."},{"lineNumber":86563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やりました、ぱわーあっぷ？　です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We did it, power-up?\""},{"lineNumber":86564,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城で働く兵士達が憤っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldiers working at Rance Castle were outraged."},{"lineNumber":86565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、なんなのだあのランスという男は！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously, what kind of man is that Rance?!"},{"lineNumber":86566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれが世界で一番偉い男とは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"　He’s supposed to be the most important man in the world!\""},{"lineNumber":86567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人を倒すことが出来るのは確かにすごいが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s true he can defeat demons,"},{"lineNumber":86568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だがだからと言って、あれは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　but that doesn’t mean he is...\""},{"lineNumber":86569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……また、お、犯されました……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... again, I was v-violated..."},{"lineNumber":86570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、地元に恋人がいるのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　Even though I have a lover back home...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪王すら部下にするとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To even make the Youkai King your subordinate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが俺様だな！　がははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as expected of me! Gahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、いいのだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-well, that's fine, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほーう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohoh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はこんな摩訶不思議な食い物があるのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So now there are such mysterious foods like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かすていら、ねぇ、ハイカラな味だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Castella, huh? It has a fancy flavor!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お口に合って良かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm glad it suits your taste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ沢山あるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s still plenty left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかわりして下さいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please have some more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、甘いのはいくらでも入るぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I can eat as many sweets as I want!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーっ、うっさい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah, shut up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、わんわんなんて飼うもんじゃないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, you shouldn’t keep a dog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デカイし、むさいし、声はでかいし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re big, smelly, and loud..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まだ返品は可だろうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I wonder if I can still return it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おめぇ、あんだけ部下にするって息巻いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, boasting about making so many subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更そんなことがよく言えるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how can you say something like that now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すまない、こういう御仁なのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, that’s just the kind of guy he is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、まあいいさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, well, it’s fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変な奴には慣れてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m used to weird people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところでお前がいれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, if you’re around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸に妖怪連れて行けるってのは本当か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is it true that you can bring youkai to the continent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、かなりの数も連れて行けるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I can bring along quite a few."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの防備もあります故、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Considering JAPAN’s defenses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていける妖怪は少数となりましょうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the number of youkai that can be brought along will be limited."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってことは目玉の嫁共を仲間にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that means I can make those eyeball wives my allies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸で連れ回すことだって出来るのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and take them around the continent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つっても、今は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, at the moment..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、今のJAPAN軍は防衛だけで精一杯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, the JAPAN army is currently doing its best just to defend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿の部隊は大陸に渡る手段が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance’s troops have no means

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のところありませんので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at this time to cross to the continent..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、お前の折角の力、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, your precious power

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この状況じゃちっとも役に立たんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is of no use at all in this situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな呆れた目ぇすんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don’t look at me so disapprovingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 役立てたかったんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I wanted to be useful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな状況以外で部下にしてくれや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please make me your subordinate somewhere other than in a situation like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、それもそーだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that’s true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えとく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll think about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ところでお前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...By the way, can you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美女に変身できたりせんのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: transform into a beautiful woman?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　出来ねぇが、出来たらどうすんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? I can’t, but what if I could?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出来ないならいい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you can’t, that’s fine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王様にすごいことを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you’ve done something amazing for the first Youkai King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪軍団が揃ったことにより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the youkai troops gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋の防備は強固に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the defenses of Tenmabashi became strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな仲間、初代妖怪王黒部を従え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a new comrade, the first Youkai King Kurobe at their side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は更に拠点の守りを強化したのだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others further strengthened their base's defenses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やりました、ぱわーあっぷ？　です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We did it, power-up?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城で働く兵士達が憤っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers working at Rance Castle were outraged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、なんなのだあのランスという男は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, what kind of man is that Rance?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが世界で一番偉い男とは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s supposed to be the most important man in the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人を倒すことが出来るのは確かにすごいが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s true he can defeat demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがだからと言って、あれは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that doesn’t mean he is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……また、お、犯されました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... again, I was v-violated...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、地元に恋人がいるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I have a lover back home..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪王すら部下にするとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To even make the Youkai King your subordinate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすが俺様だな！　がははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as expected of me! Gahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、いいのだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-well, that's fine, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほーう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohoh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はこんな摩訶不思議な食い物があるのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So now there are such mysterious foods like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かすていら、ねぇ、ハイカラな味だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Castella, huh? It has a fancy flavor!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お口に合って良かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm glad it suits your taste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ沢山あるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s still plenty left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかわりして下さいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please have some more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、甘いのはいくらでも入るぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I can eat as many sweets as I want!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーっ、うっさい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah, shut up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、わんわんなんて飼うもんじゃないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, you shouldn’t keep a dog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デカイし、むさいし、声はでかいし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re big, smelly, and loud..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まだ返品は可だろうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I wonder if I can still return it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おめぇ、あんだけ部下にするって息巻いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, boasting about making so many subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更そんなことがよく言えるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how can you say something like that now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すまない、こういう御仁なのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, that’s just the kind of guy he is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、まあいいさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, well, it’s fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変な奴には慣れてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m used to weird people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところでお前がいれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, if you’re around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸に妖怪連れて行けるってのは本当か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is it true that you can bring youkai to the continent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、かなりの数も連れて行けるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I can bring along quite a few."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの防備もあります故、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Considering JAPAN’s defenses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていける妖怪は少数となりましょうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the number of youkai that can be brought along will be limited."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってことは目玉の嫁共を仲間にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that means I can make those eyeball wives my allies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸で連れ回すことだって出来るのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and take them around the continent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つっても、今は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, at the moment..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、今のJAPAN軍は防衛だけで精一杯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, the JAPAN army is currently doing its best just to defend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿の部隊は大陸に渡る手段が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance’s troops have no means

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のところありませんので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at this time to cross to the continent..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、お前の折角の力、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, your precious power

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この状況じゃちっとも役に立たんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is of no use at all in this situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな呆れた目ぇすんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don’t look at me so disapprovingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 役立てたかったんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I wanted to be useful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな状況以外で部下にしてくれや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please make me your subordinate somewhere other than in a situation like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、それもそーだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that’s true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えとく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll think about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ところでお前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...By the way, can you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美女に変身できたりせんのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: transform into a beautiful woman?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　出来ねぇが、出来たらどうすんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? I can’t, but what if I could?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出来ないならいい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you can’t, that’s fine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王様にすごいことを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you’ve done something amazing for the first Youkai King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪軍団が揃ったことにより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the youkai troops gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋の防備は強固に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the defenses of Tenmabashi became strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな仲間、初代妖怪王黒部を従え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a new comrade, the first Youkai King Kurobe at their side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は更に拠点の守りを強化したのだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others further strengthened their base's defenses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やりました、ぱわーあっぷ？　です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We did it, power-up?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城で働く兵士達が憤っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers working at Rance Castle were outraged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、なんなのだあのランスという男は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, what kind of man is that Rance?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが世界で一番偉い男とは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s supposed to be the most important man in the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人を倒すことが出来るのは確かにすごいが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s true he can defeat demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがだからと言って、あれは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that doesn’t mean he is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……また、お、犯されました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... again, I was v-violated...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、地元に恋人がいるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I have a lover back home..."
